attributes.action: Mass immigration is unsustainable on this level. STOP and listen to the people.
attributes.background: The public is under the impression that Cameron could strike a deal to allow us to take back our borders. If we stay in the E.U this is not the case as it is up to Brussels, publicly inform the nation as people need to know BEFORE they vote that we can't control mass immigration!

rejection.details:
If you would like the Government to change its immigration policy, you could start a new petition calling for the specific change you want to see.

You may find that there is already a petition open on the site that calls for the change you want. If not, you can start a new one.
